name: Good Mornings
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a light weight or dumbbell bar with both hands.

2. Keeping your back straight, slowly lean forward at the hips while maintaining a neutral spine position.

3. Let your arms hang straight down from your shoulders as you focus on stretching your entire back side.

4. Hold this stretch for 15-20 seconds and repeat 3 sets, keeping your core engaged throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Good mornings is a stretching exercise that targets the lower back muscles and can improve flexibility in this area of the body.
